title: Ticket #2334: Infinite loop in condor_submit
description: When testing out the latest-greatest on 7.7.0, I triggered an infinite loop in condor_submit in x509_proxy_email. Patch forthcoming.
remarks:
2011-Jul-27 10:25:18 by jfrey:
Brian, what does your credential subject look like? Do you know what in the proxy makes the code go into the inner loop?

My only comment on the patch is that we should check the value of email in the outer loop guard, not email2, since that's the variable we use after the loop.

2011-Jul-27 13:30:24 by jfrey:
Based on our testing, this bug will be triggered by any proxy that's delegated over the network or created from a certificate that doesn't have an 'X509v3 Subject Alternative Name' field. Every job submitted through a Globus gatekeeper to a Condor 7.7.0 pool would hit this bug.
attachments: • x509_email_loop.patch 925 bytes added by bbockelm on 2011-Jul-27 04:04:05 UTC.
